Html:
Hi,

I am very much new to vc++ programming.Please help me to to do the following,

  • Make sure the PST File Format SDK directory is in your compilers include path
  • Make sure the Boost directory is in your compilers include path

    What i am doing was creating win32 console application in vs 2010(.net 4.0) and adding library refrence by project properties-->c/c++-Add additional include directives.but it throws me error.I have downloaded pstsdk and boost 1.42 and extracted to a folder.

    please help me how out on how to add sdk directories.
